phrases: If you have really betrayed Fairy Tail, then you must have some reason!
And now all my research has come to fruition, and I have completed my Dragonoid!
Should not you people be singing my praises or something?
Is that the voice of this Daphne person?
Give us Natsu back this instant!
I am sure you realize that my Dragonoid here moves by sucking out Natsu Dragneel's magic power.
Until I have sucked out all that magic power,
I are not givin' Natsu Dragneel back!
To a wizard, one's magic power is their very life!
So, what are we going to do?
As long as you keep up the good work,
we will be fully charged in no time.
Then, my Dragonoid will be operational for half an eternity!
You want to get in her way?
Although even with your powers combined,
I highly doubt you can hold out long enough to see it fully charged.
I have heard of a dangerous, dragon-crazed wizard who was trying to create an artificial dragon...
They should say the genius scientist Daphne succeeded in creating an artificial dragon.
The egg remains I found back then...
It was truly a long struggle for me to perfect it.
It all started with the first step: Successfully hatching an artificial dragon from an egg.
The city I lived in was the perfect place to gather data, or so I thought.
But the people who come from my city can all use Hidden, see.
Unable to experiment on the city, I had no more use for it.
If you like playing hide-and-go-seek so much...
As punishment, I made it so they could not dispel their Hidden.
I also punished the incomplete dragons who were unable
to sense the people who had vanished with their Hidden.
When I went to that city...
After that, I left the city.
Ever since then, it became known as the City without Sound.
I continued my research, and finally it dawned on me.
I needed the power of a Dragon Slayer to activate the Dragonoid.
Keep working until you drop dead!
For me, and my evil ambitions!
Looks like it is not just big, it is also going to be seriously tough!
What are you planning to do by creating such a thing?
My great ambition is to complete the perfect Dragonoid!
Even this is nothing more than a prototype.
First up, we have to test its current ability!
Lower half's mobility is sub-par, I see.
She is what they call a Mad Scientist!
With Natsu-san inside, we cannot just attack carelessly!
Is this what you wished for?
You have gone and done it this time!
As I am a Man, I will bring you back to the guild!
Do not think ill of me.
Looks like he got word of Daphne.
He is decided to ask Gray how to get rid of that giant thing.
It is heading straight for Magnolia!
It is already too late for anyone to stop my Dragonoid.
Lucy and the rest of you return to the guild and get everyone mobilized.
I will do all that I can.
And you take care of Natsu,'kay?
An artificial creature that mimics people's attributes?
Even if you have the same attributes as I, you do not carry the same burdens!
I have made sure to take careful records of the previous battle's data.
You will soon find out the power of my Lizardmen v. 2.5!
These are the spiky fellows Erza talked about.
Came to take Gray back, have we?
Looks more like they are here to wipe us all out!
A Man will repel the enemy!
So that is the Dragon-thing that Lucy mentioned?
The city's going to be destroyed at this rate!
We cannot guarantee that the guild will be safe, either...
Does the master know about this?
He went to gather everyone from the guild.
The bunch that went to capture Gray are not come back either!
What the heck is going on?
Damn it... I have lost my touch...
You are not gettin' him back!
Were you really working with them behind the scenes, Gray?
I have been saved by Natsu countless times...
When I screwed up on a job...
Ever since he was a kid, he had a smart mouth,
and never thought about consequences to his actions.
For a Man, what matters is how he takes responsibility!
And I will see to it that Gray takes responsibility for this!
I am getting chills up my spine just thinking about how fun it will be to pulverize it!
So sit there in your box seat and watch the fireworks!
Assuming you even have the strength to do that...
I know I have heard it somewhere...
We are the people who live in this city.
Because of a magic called Hidden, you cannot see our bodies anymore!
Then just undo the magic, right?
We called out to you because we cannot do that.
I am a Fairy Tail Wizard!
I am the Dragon Slayer, Natsu!
I are not going to lie.
And you do not have to be that surprised.
Please, rid us of this magic curse!
You must defeat the one who controls dragons.
No one can control a dragon!
But if there is someone like that, I will beat'them.
We will place our hopes with you.
I thought it was a dream or something, so I would completely forgotten.
Defeat the one who controls dragons...
So this is what they meant?
Well, I promised, did not I?!
Natsu Dragneel's power's grown higher than my data!
At this rate, my Dragonoid will go into overdrive!
I are not going to lose!
At times like this, if I calmly and meticulously
keep sucking up your magic at a reasonable pace, then AOK.
Thank you for the lovely magic power!
Elfman and the others came back, but...
Take Wakaba and Macao to the back!
Take it from here... Save Natsu!
I should have brought you with us!
If you keep moping around like that forever,
that are not going to make Lisanna smile, will it?
She was always smiling, no matter what.
She was smiling until the very end.
I am sure that is the way she was!
It is the sad times when she smiled even more!
Is not that what they call being a man?!
I will heal him with my Sky Magic!
Tell us what the hell's going on here!
If you do not, I will...
There is no way that Gray-sama has betrayed Fairy Tail!
Even if the whole world turned against him!
You are takin' me to Gramps, right?
I do not think we have time to kill.
We are making sure you do not try anything funny.
I am okay... I have to cure Wakaba-san and Macao-san soon, or...
If you use any more Sky Magic, your own life will be at risk!
Then I can really be a member of Fairy Tail!
Everyone, please work together and save Natsu!
We all owe Natsu, big time.
When we were beat up by Phantom...
Natsu fought for us back then.
It is the same for everyone else, right?
This time, we will be the ones to save Natsu!
If we all work together, we can save Natsu!
Tail is a guild that lives and dies with Magnolia.
Our first priority is to protect the city from being destroyed!
You want us to attack that thing?
But Natsu is inside of it!
Use any means necessary to stop the Dragonoid!
His body's built nice and sturdy!
You are not a wizard that would be done in by something like this!
If you had not been there,
I would have already thrown away my life.
Natsu, I am going to bring you back with me!
I will stomp you flat, Erza Scarlet!
Only Natsu can defeat that Dragonoid!
So the master decided that destroying the Dragonoid was the top priority?
He said he was sturdily built, so he should be fine.
On Master's orders, we will stop the Dragonoid with our full strength!
Before we do that, I want to check with you!
Sure, I will let you hear...
Cock an ear and listen up.
Bust this thing up, and me along with it!
No matter how far away, we will come when you call!
Whether it is searching for monsters or defeating monsters...
No matter what the problem, we will solve it with one punch!
That is Fairy Tail in a nutshell!
Yeah, I think we should cut out your lines, Natsu.
